title: Add LICENSE file.
message: Add LICENSE file.

title: Fix crash when starting random game before first run of custom.
message: Fix crash when starting random game before first run of custom.

title: Code cleanup.
message: Code cleanup.

title: Switch to standard number keyboard (use input type properly).
message: Switch to standard number keyboard (use input type properly).

title: Externalize strings from xml files and format xml.
message:
Externalize strings from xml files and format xml.
Fix crash caused by %d where %s needed in hud strings. [412ea5f935]
Remove residual ad layout view.
Remove unused mission and multiplayer buttons.

title: Apply Apache License, Version 2.0.
message: Apply Apache License, Version 2.0.

title: Externalize strings.
message:
Externalize strings.
Don't kill process on exit.
Reduce visibility modifiers.
.classpath update by ADT.

title: Crash fixes and updates.
message:
Crash fixes and updates.

Fix crash at launch by removing ads.
Fix NoClassDefFoundError at GameField start by exporting AndEngine libs.
Ignore gen directory and unignore .gitignore.
Changes from updated Android SDK.

title: Move project into git root.
message:
Move project into git root.

-This is because a Pro version is no longer expected.

Remove tasks.txt (move into ignored dev folder).

title: Remove "(v2 only)" from Projectile radius description.
message:
Remove "(v2 only)" from Projectile radius description.

Also small update to tasks.

title: Move Custom game type button to bottom
message:
Move Custom game type button to bottom

Rename "Random target" to "Random Targets".
Center ad in portrait mode. (just in case)

title: Scale font overlay to screen density, fix velocity limit.
message:
Scale font overlay to screen density, fix velocity limit.

-Remove final from FONT_SIZE & rename accordingly.
-Fix velocity limit mistake.

title: Add touchscreen angle/velocity control.
message:
Add touchscreen angle/velocity control.

-Add touchscreen drag & pressure sensitivity preferences.
-Add check/reset for sensitivity preferences.
-Update Help with the new controls.

-Add summary to Scale PreferenceScreen indicating contained options.
-Limit range of angle to 0 - 90 and velocity minimum 0.
-Limit display of angle/velocity to 1 decimal point.
-Change from SmoothCamera to Camera since not using zoom.
-Insert newline between sentences of toast for corrected preferences.
-Replace summary of hit target color with text from it's dialogTitle.
-Remove dialogTitle from all preferences, title is good enough.
-Tweak summaryOn & summaryOff for Auto-fire.
-Tweak some wording in Help.

title: Fix autofire for certain devices & add for touchscreen.
message:
Fix autofire for certain devices & add for touchscreen.

-Change from key repeat to TimerTask/Timer.
  -Eliminate long press issue.
  -Fix issue found on G1 where key repeat didn't occur.
-Boolean for autofire firing to avoid Dpad/touchscreen overlap.

Also:
-Remove commented zoom code, expect much different zoom code later.

title: Add MdotM SDK for more ads through AdWhirl.
message:
Add MdotM SDK for more ads through AdWhirl.

-Recompile custom AdWhirl lib with support for SDK's beyond AdMob.
-Add READ_PHONE_STATE permission required by MdotM.
-Add MdotM SDK.

title: Classic: Add custom projectile size & clean up.
message:
Classic: Add custom projectile size & clean up.

-Move defining of variables into ClassicView class.
-Add custom projectile size.
-Change variable & method names to fit naming conventions.
-Remove unnecessary brackets from single-line if statements.
-Remove commented experimental explosion code.

title: Move projectile size to Custom Game, separate XML for items.
message:
Move projectile size to Custom Game, separate XML for items.

-Move projectile size setting from preferences to Custom Game.
-Move Custom Game scrollview items into separate XML & include.
  -Reuses XML for both portrait & landscape.

Also:
-Change Custom Game variables to fit naming convention.
-Change textSize type in all Custom Game layouts from dp to sp.

title: Disable Pixels Per Meter option.
message:
Disable Pixels Per Meter option.

-Comment out preference.
-Change getString default value from null to "1", same for speed.

Reason: More trouble than it's worth & zoom/pan should replace it.

title: Revise scoring.
message:
Revise scoring.

-Add to global variables: boolean collide, String scoreType.
-Move from beginContact to global variables: expTarget, keepTargets.
-Separate score equations for Random game type.
  -Collide & Keep Targets: score += nTargets * hits
  -Else: hits * 20
-Separate high scores for Random game type.
  -Collide & Keep Targets: "rMulti"
  -Else: "rSingle"
-Add more detail about scoring in Help.

title: Fix invisible targets with high Pixels Per Meter.
message:
Fix invisible targets with high Pixels Per Meter.

-Change targetRadius, targetD, targetH type from int to float.
-Include entire equation for nextInt in cast to int.
-Remove cast to int when setting targetRadius.

title: Fix very high score crash, align score to right edge.
message:
Fix very high score crash, align score to right edge.

-Change score type to long.
-Fix crash at start caused by text going beyond set maximum.
-Change font typeface to monospace.
-Add FONT_SIZE constant of 20.
-Keep score text aligned to right edge of screen.
-Remove HorizontalAlign.RIGHT.

title: Fix borders & random target position/size when scaled.
message:
Fix borders & random target position/size when scaled.

-Borders at screen edge with 1px thickness regardless of meter scale.
-Random targets stay within screen, scale to px instead of meter.

Also:
-Increase minimum random target radius from 3px to 6px.
-Remove unnecessary setting target variables before calling addTarget.
-Remove old comment that is no longer relevant.

title: Clear saved scores in preferences.
message:
Clear saved scores in preferences.

Also change "Reset Preferences" to "Reset preferences".

title: Rename preference keys.
message:
Rename preference keys.

-Remove "pref" from all key names.
-Add check to GameType class to move old preferences if they exist.
-Fix resetting custom values in Preferences (forgot to change earlier).
  -Rename prefs from valuePref to custom.
  -Change toast message when resetting custom values.
-Fix Custom prefs in Classic Mode (forgot to change earlier).
  -Rename prefs from valuePref to custom.
  -Rename variable from values to prefCustom.
  -Remove "pref" from key names.
  -Change mode from 0 to MODE_PRIVATE (0).

title: Update About dialog.
message:
Update About dialog.

-Set text color to light gray to prevent it from changing when touched.
-Add link to Cannon website.
-Update main text to be like that used in my other apps.
-Add controls and scoring information.
-Change name in menu from "About" to "Help/About".
-Change title from "About Cannon" to "Help/About".
-Add toast message at launch telling users that help and prefs are in menu.

title: Save and display high score, preference tweaks.
message:
Save and display high score, preference tweaks.

-Save high score to a new SharedPreferences for scores.
-Display high score under current score in scene.
-Only keep and display scores in Random Mode.
-Rename values (SharedPrefs: valuePref) to prefCustom (custom).
-Rename SharedPreferences for custom game from valuePref to custom.
    If old prefs exist, move data from old prefs to new prefs.
-Change mode for all SharedPreferences from 0 to MODE_PRIVATE (0).

title: Move tasks from source file into own text file.
message:
Move tasks from source file into own text file.

-Move TODO's and FIXME's into own file: tasks.txt.
-Remove source block comment.
-Remove TODO and FIXME tags.
-Indent items.

title: Organize TODO's and FIXME's.
message:
Organize TODO's and FIXME's.

Add priority for FIXME's.
Add v2.0.2.
More focus on smaller updates.

title: Include Eclipse project files.
message:
Include Eclipse project files.

Include .classpath and .project so it can be imported
into Eclipse as existing project.

title: Update icons to style of v2.
message:
Update icons to style of v2.

Change target to solid circle, slightly larger.
Fully transparent background.
Feather grid into transparency at edges.
Unlike v1 icons, only scale for different resolutions.

title: Combo scoring and remove trail when below velocity.
message:
Combo scoring and remove trail when below velocity.

Combo scoring:
  -Hit score = Number of targets by power of hits per projectile.
  -Track per-ball hits.
  -Track number of targets on screen.
  -Track shot number with projectile. (not yet used in scoring)

Remove trail from ball if it goes below 5m/s.
Removed most commented code not planned to be used later.
Few changes to TODO's and added a FIXME.

title: Reorganize preferences.
message:
Reorganize preferences.

Reorganize preferences into categorical screens.
Old: Screen for v2-only options, categories for option types.
New: Screens for option types, categories for v2-only options.

Also organize TODO's a bit and add a FIXME.

title: Add auto-fire to v2 and improve targets.
message:
Add auto-fire to v2 and improve targets.

-Fix crashes by including calls to body within runOnUpdateThread
-Use targetBody.getUserData to determine if target is most recent
-Move target contact actions from endContact to beginContact
-Use TimerTask to delay target firework & removal by 100ms
	Allows ball to bounce off target
-removeTaget unnecessary, use removeBall directly
-Add auto-fire (machine gun sytle)
	Uses preference from v1
-Change onKeyDown from if-statements to switch
-Rename removeBall to removeSprite for more accurate description

title: Fix freeze and color entry issues.
message:
Fix freeze and color entry issues.

-Fix freeze in random mode caused by adding target
	PhysicsFactory.createCircleBody needed runOnUpdateThread
-Fix invalid color reset for Completed Target
	Reset was going to color of normal Target
-Fix color entry to prioritize letters before numbers on physical keyboard

title: -Changed version in manifest from r1 to @string/app_version
message:
-Changed version in manifest from r1 to @string/app_version
-Enabled trail for v2
-Basic check of impossible projectile return to screen
-Added WAKE_LOCK permission
-Moved add/remove entity into methods

title: -Adjusted score overlay position
message:
-Adjusted score overlay position
-Changed scoring to remove points upon firing and add points on hit
-Added custom color for hit target
-Moved initial preference defaults loader from CustomGame to GameType
-Changed wording of toast messages for empty grid scale preference

title: -Fireworks
message:
-Fireworks
-Increased circle texture resolution from 32x32 to 128x128
-Score overlay
-Changed to a simpler scoring method (mostly)
-Various other changes and improvements (don't remember them all after long day)

title: -Fixed landscape layout not renamed
message:
-Fixed landscape layout not renamed
-CustomGame screen no longer restarted when exiting preferences
-Process is killed when exiting with back button from first screen
-Several v2-only preferences

title: -Renamed some classes and main layout
message:
-Renamed some classes and main layout
-Added game type selection screen
-Moved Fire button to right in landscape
